Uses of Interface
oracle.ucp.jdbc.ConnectionInitializationCallback

  • Packages that use ConnectionInitializationCallback 
    Package Description
    oracle.ucp.jdbc
    Includes various interfaces and classes used by applications to work with JDBC connections and a connection pool.

    • Uses of ConnectionInitializationCallback in oracle.ucp.jdbc

      Methods in oracle.ucp.jdbc that return ConnectionInitializationCallback 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ConnectionInitializationCallback PoolDataSource.getConnectionInitializationCallback()
      Obtains the registered connection initialization callback, if any.
      ConnectionInitializationCallback PoolDataSourceImpl.getConnectionInitializationCallback()
      Obtains the registered connection initialization callback, if any.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Registers a connection initialization callback.

      Registers a connection initialization callback.
